import React, { useContext} from 'react' import diomond from './diomond.png' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import total from './total.png' function Navbar(props) { const navigate=useNavigate() // show total Monthly Income const hendleLogout=()=>{ const logout=window.confirm("Do You Want to Logout..?") if(logout){ localStorage.removeItem('token') navigate('/login') } } return (

TaskTally

 {localStorage.getItem('token')?

{ props.length >0 && props.result.reduce((sum, currentItem) => sum + currentItem.dailywork, 0)}

: " "} {!localStorage.getItem('token')?
Login Sinup
:
Home Report MyTrip Logout
}
) } export default Navbar
